      • toHex

        public static java.lang.String toHex(java.lang.Object o,
                     boolean bool)
        These next method converts a byte array or a string into a hex string with percents!
        Parameters:
        biteArray - -> This byte array will be converted into hex format
        bool - -> This indicates whether or not the returned string should include percent signs. true means should have percents
        Returns:

      • createPeerList

                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.nio.ByteBuffer,java.lang.Object>> peer_map)
        This method will put the list of peers that came in the tracker response into an arraylist of objects.
        Parameters:
        peer_map - - The peer map that contains the peer information
        client -
        Returns:

      • findPort

        public static int findPort(java.lang.String ip)
        This method is used to find an open port to connect to a peer. Specifically, to the peer ip address (if there is one) that is specified in the command line argument.
        Parameters:
        ip - -The connection needs to be started with this peer ip.
        Returns:
        - A port that is open. Return 0 if an open port cannot be found.

      • setDownloadedBytes

        public static void setDownloadedBytes(RUBTClient client)
        If the client was shut down and restarted, this method will refill the rawFileBytes with the bytes from the download file if it exists. To ensure that the rawFileBytes are correctly brought in from the file, piece hashes are created from their pieces and checked against the hashes in the piece_hashes array in torrentInfo

      • getFileBytes

        public static byte[] getFileBytes(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                  int torrent_file_length)
        This method converts a file into a byte array, useful when restarting a download after stopping.
        Parameters:
        file - - the file that will be converted
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
